articles.title: Jamie Carragher says Messi is better than Ronaldo... but he has more respect for Juventus man - Daily Mail
articles.description: It is one of the most hotly contested debates in football, and the Liverpool legend is the latest to give his opinion on the matter. Carragher says he prefers Messi but respects Ronaldo more.
articles.content:

articles.title: Lee Grant reveals all on Sean Dyche's attempts to axe 'poisonous' players from his Burnley squad - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lee Grant, 38, played at Turf Moor between 2010 and 2013 and has now provided a fascinating insight into boss Sean Dyche's methods to rid bad influences from within his squad.
